verses.roman:
āra eka kathā rāya kahilā āmāre
'kṛṣṇa-kathā-vaktā kari' nā jāniha more

synonyms: āra—another; eka—one; kathā—topic; rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; kahilā āmāre—said to me; kṛṣṇa-kathā-vaktā—the speaker on the talks of Kṛṣṇa; kari'-as; nā jāniha more—do not consider me.
translation: "There is one other thing Rāmānanda Rāya said to me. 'Do not consider me the speaker in these talks about Kṛṣṇa.
